lead_paragraph: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp has said that he is losing respect for critics who continue to question his side's defensive frailties.

headline.print_headline: Klopp Hits Back at Doubters for Questioning Liverpool Defence
headline.main: Klopp Hits Back at Doubters for Questioning Liverpool Defence

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp has said that he is losing respect for critics who continue to question his side's defensive frailties....
